questions.question: Translate into English: Der Roman war super.

choices.answer: The roman was great.
The book was great.

choices.answer: James is a sensitive man.

questions.question: Translate into English: Urlaub an einem See sind mir am liebsten.

choices.answer: I love holidays close to the sea.

questions.question: Translate into English: In diesem Stadium wird die Larve zum Schmetterling.

choices.answer: At this stage the larva turns into a butterfly.

At this moment the butterfly flies away.

questions.question: You know...: Früher verpesteten alle Fabriken die Luft.

choices.answer: Years ago all fabrics polluted the air.
Years ago the industry polluted the air.

Years ago factories polluted the air.

questions.question: One more: Mein Bruder ist Koch und er mag den Job.

choices.answer: My brother is a chef and he likes the job.

My brother is the boss in a restaurant and he likes the job.
